sentences.sContent: Usually his cases involved errant husbands and wandering wives.
sentences.sCn: 通常他接手的案子都涉及出轨的丈夫和离家出走的妻子。

synos.tran: 不定的；周游的；错误的；偏离正路的

phrases.pCn: n. 唐·吉诃德式的人物；游侠骑士

words.tran: 错误；错误状态；犯错误的倾向

trans.tranCn: 不定的；周游的；错误的；偏离正路的
trans.tranOther: Errant is used to describe someone whose actions are considered unacceptable or wrong by other people. For example, an errant husband is unfaithful to his wife.
